name: French Accents
description: Write French accents using a hotkey

activate-accents.description: Activate the accents feature, and while holding the modifier key (Ctrl or Alt) keep tapping the letter key to cycle through a list of French accents. Release to insert.

move-selection-down.description: After activating the accents feature, use this shortcut to jump between the lines for faster navigation.

move-selection-left.description: After activating the accents feature, use this shortcut to cycle backwards.

copy-accents.description: NAH my bruv Copy a list of all French accents to your clipboard.
